mapper.select: SELECT A.NOTICE_ID AS noticeId, A.TITLE AS title, A.CONTENT AS content, A.OPEN_YMD AS openYmd, A.CLOSE_YMD AS closeYmd FROM NOTICES A WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
SELECT A.NOTICE_ID AS noticeId, A.SEQ AS seq, A.FILE_NM AS fileNm, A.FILE_URL AS fileUrl FROM NOTICE_FILE A WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
SELECT A.NOTICE_ID AS noticeId, A.SEQ AS seq, A.FILE_NM AS fileNm, A.FILE_URL AS fileUrl FROM NOTICE_FILE A WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId} AND SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICES ( NOTICE_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, OPEN_YMD, CLOSE_YMD, REG_DATE, REG_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{noticeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{openYmd}, #{closeYmd}, SYSDATE, #{sessionUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(A NOTICE_FILE_PK) */ NVL(MAX(A.SEQ),0)+1 FROM NOTICE_FILE A WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE_FILE ( NOTICE_ID, SEQ, FILE_NM, FILE_URL, FILE_CONTENT, REG_DATE, REG_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #{noticeId}, #{seq}, #{fileNm}, #{fileUrl}, #{fileContent}, SYSDATE, #{sessionUserId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICES SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, OPEN_YMD = #{openYmd}, CLOSE_YMD = #{closeYmd}, UPD_DATE = SYSDATE, UPD_USER_ID = #{sessionUserId} WHERE NOTICE_ID = #{noticeId}
